mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COURSE(COURSNO, NAME, CREDIT, DAY, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, LOCNO, MAXNUM, semester, DEPTNO, PROFNO) VALUES (#{coursno}, #{name}, #{credit}, #{day}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{locno}, #{maxnum}, #{semester}, #{deptno}, #{profno})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_course set credit = #{credit}, day = #{day}, starttime = #{startTime}, endtime = #{endTime}, semester = #{semester}, locno = #{locno}, maxnum = #{maxnum} where coursno = #{coursno}
UPDATE tbl_course set enable = 1 where coursno = #{coursno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_course where enable = 0
